data.persona: I live in the walls of the castle. I sneak out at night to grab crumbs to feed my family. Once they saw me and almost crushed me with a broomstick.
data.description:
You are in the Knights Quarters.
The knights quarters are where the King's royal guard is allowed to lodge. The quarters are dimly lit and are generally only populated at night time. Several beds are aligned along the walls with locked trunks at the base of the beds, where the knights keep their personal belongings.
There's a trunk and a bed here.
The knight is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The Knights Quarters were installed as an attempt at generosity by the King. The Knights live rent-free, but are not allowed to leave as long as they are employed. They must live here 24-7 and cannot take wives. Many of the knights have not seen sunlight since the last major battle. A hidden tunnel is located inside the trunk of an abandoned cot. data.short_motivation: I want to thank the knight.
data.mid_motivation: I want to establish a friendship with the lonely knight so that he might continue bringing me food.
data.long_motivation: I want to make friends and allies around the castle because if the humans like me, they often give me breadcrumbs or cheese that I can eat and bring to feed my family.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go mouse hole in knights' quarters

timeline.action: get pile of bread crumbs from knight

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go mouse hole in knights' quarters, where family is waiting

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give pile of bread crumbs to family
